text: December unemployment rates ranged from 1.7% in NE to 6.5% in CA.
GDP growth between Q3 2020 and Q3 2021 ranged from 0.2% in Alaska to 7.4% in Tennessee.
In Q3 2021, 24 states saw their greatest annual house price growth in three decades.
Leisure and hospitality jobs were at least 20% below prepandemic levels in AK, HI, NY, and DC.
Average private weekly earnings in December ranged from $813 in MS to $1,286 in CA.
State and local public sector jobs were below prepandemic levels in every state except Idaho.
MN and 39 other states saw manufacturing GDP exceed prepandemic levels in Q3 2021.
In December 2021, 12 states saw their lowest unemployment rates in 45 years.
From Q3 2020 to Q3 2021, house price increases ranged from 8.0% in DC to 35.8% in ID.
In Q3 2021, retail GDP was below prepandemic levels in every state except Washington.
